title: Extremely Fun
review: Ever since I downloaded this game I have been constantly playing it. This game takes the struggle out of someone having to be banker. A game dragging on for 10+hrs and people are always online playing. There were a few kinks with it in the beginning. But I am seeing that they are fixing it now. I am only giving it 4 stars because as of late a lot of the games I have been in the middle of playing will just not be able to resume. It will be someone else‚Äôs turn and they just never come out of their turn. I think their should be a time limit once they have handled they business. Otherwise you have to wait until they ‚Äúend turn‚Äù & this creates problems in the game. My games were all lost and needed to be exited after this occurred and all that I worked for or played for was lost. This creates a waste of time. Which is pretty unfortunate but other than that this game is extremely fun. I purchased both the other boards the snow and the 1930‚Äôs board I love all of them. Wish the tokens were a bit cheaper and more options. Overall few bug fixes and this game is going to remain my favorite. I have been telling everyone about it so that they can join me in a game virtually!
sentence: Ever since I downloaded this game I have been constantly playing it.

title: Among us is dead
review: Ok, so among used to be the worlds most popular game. I personally was over the top crazy for it and loved it, but it‚Äôs now dead for many reasons. One reason is hackers and cheaters. More mods are being used and hacking and cheating is getting more popular. Some times, I can‚Äôt play one game without a hacker or cheater. Multiple people play together and say who is the imposter and some hackers are being able to kill in the middle of meetings and do visuals as imposter. Another reason is that there are no new maps. Among us said that the new airship would come out in early December 2020, but they delayed it and said early 2021. Everyone thought it would come out in January or February, but it‚Äôs March and it still hasn‚Äôt come out yet. Another reason is that the new chat update can‚Äôt let you talk freely. Now you spend all of  your meeting time searching around for the prewritten text that you want to say. Another reason is the horrible connection. Some times, I have to spend like 20 minutes trying to connect my game. People say it‚Äôs my bad wifi, but that‚Äôs not true because my wifi works perfectly fine. The last reason is that some people change settings so that either the crew or the imposters have an almost certain win. If you are reading this long review, then I thank you for your time. If you are reading this and are from inner sloth, then hopefully you will consider doing something to revive among us.
sentence: One reason is hackers and cheaters.

title: Are you listening
review: I‚Äôm sure this will fall on deaf ears! Before I downloaded this app I read all the reviews! Everything everyone said about it is so true, yet you do nothing about it! I think a game should be fun and challenging but not frustrating! There‚Äôs not enough moves especially when a square has to be unblocked two or three different times. The levels can be beat but it takes way too long to beat them sometimes. Then you get one star for all your work! I like the idea of decorating the house that‚Äôs why I got the app! Instead I get to use my stars to feed the cat, call a taxi, or answer the door! So frustrating!! Please listen to your reviewers!I‚Äôm starting to hate this game! Sooooo frustrating! I may have to delete it! Sad because it could be so much fun! üòïI see the developers still really don‚Äôt give a crap. After reading so many complaints on here and the developers never even answer one of them. I am not using my stars on putting up decorations in the kitchen. Dumb! Why have so many rooms when you can‚Äôt get into them? Ridiculous! I really only play it when I absolutely have nothing else to do because I‚Äôll never get to really decorate the house. I thought that was the point of the game. Has anyone completely decorated the whole house? I think it‚Äôs impossible. What‚Äôs the point of the game if you can‚Äôt finish it!  Oh, and I absolutely refuse to spend any money on this game. I‚Äôd delete it first!
sentence: I may have to delete it!

title: Fun but frustrating
review: So I been playing for almost a year now and I‚Äôm on the 1000+ levels. It‚Äôs fun but it totally clickbait me on Instagram with the little games that I haven‚Äôt seen once after downloading. I‚Äôve gotten so frustrated so many times I had to stop playing for a couple of days because the levels get so hard you need god to help you and not boosters. Sometimes the normal levels are harder than the hard ones. Not only that but you start by collecting 1 star per game to having to pass multiple levels for one task, which can take 3 stars per task when it used to be 1 Star per task. And I hate when you‚Äôre remodeling a room and at of nowhere something happens in another room you have to fix. Like, everything is supposed to be new, why are they making me waste my stars on a room I had already finished ? And 5 lives isn‚Äôt enough! Either give me more lives or make them take less than 30 minutes each to reload. Oh and lastly if you‚Äôre getting a gift for infinite time let us choose when we can use it. I shouldn‚Äôt have to waste it because I had work or class. Sometimes you can‚Äôt play for 2 hours at that very second. Your girl has a life too you know.
sentence: Sometimes the normal levels are harder than the hard ones.

title: Long time player.....
review: I love this game, have been playing it for quite some time.  It‚Äôs my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù favorite.  I‚Äôm somewhere around level 1100 or close to it.  Some levels are hard to the point that it gets ridiculous.  Some of the hard levels are easy or perhaps it‚Äôs just luck to win them.  I have spent days on a level and get frustrated and then dont play for a while...but i still really enjoy this game.  You CAN win every level with out a power up.  You DO NOT need to spend any money on this game, patience is a virtue (so they say).  I have spent money and lately I haven‚Äôt.  The one thing i do agree with most reviewers on is this... to buy a power up costs wayyy too much money for the amount of coins you receive for passing a level.  To continue a game (at 900 coins) for a move or two costs a fortune considering you really don‚Äôt win much.  To buy three hammers costs too much (1900 coins).  I realize they do want you to spend money and i have but even when you spend, it doesn‚Äôt give you much in return.  I mostly just wanted to let people know you don‚Äôt have to spend money to win this game...and yes, some of the tasks are eye rolling but....its still a fun game.  Even if you don‚Äôt feel like playing, you can still receive a daily reward for logging on.
sentence: You CAN win every level with out a power up.

title: Level 1913 and beyond
review: I have enjoyed this game and have found it relaxing and fun. That was before level 1913. I liked it because I could always advance. Beating difficult levels may have taken MULTIPLE attempts but didn‚Äôt require having to spend money. However, within the game there are weekly contests where you‚Äôre placed on teams. The better you do the higher your team level placement. When you‚Äôre ranked in the lower levels I‚Äôm convinced this game randomly ‚Äúloosens up‚Äù and you‚Äôre able to go on winning streaks (doing so allows you to accumulate coins to help Austin fix the house, which is the point of the game, right?). Likewise, I‚Äôm convinced when you do well and find yourself in a higher level, the game ‚Äútightens up‚Äù and it‚Äôs impossible to win any level without spending coin, either real or earned. When I got to level 1913 I got placed in the highest ranking level. Since then I have not been able to get, even close, to beating a level without earning enough extra coins (by watching ads, etc.) to buy my way through. It takes a looooong time to earn those coins!  Relaxing and fun not so much anymore...
sentence: Relaxing and fun not so much anymore...

title: One of the better monopoly games
review: ** deleted game. The latest update seems less random with rolls and cards. After playing a day you can basically predict what will happen. :/ * Previously the dice rolls usually in favor of helping both you and the computer players rather than hurting, now they favor drama. *We need to be able to turn off trades mid-game, if you have a property the computer wants they will ask every turn. *I like the short game, but it does not make sense that you can bankrupt a computer player and then instantly lose to another computer just because their net worth was more at that moment. *Tapping the screen during animations should skip them. Turning off would be nice too, especially for short games. *When making mortgage and housing decisions it would be useful to be able to see the other players positions on the board. *There is a bug that the cards that say pay or collect from another player, do not impact the other players.*Winning games should unlock some of the features that are asking for payment.*The speedier computer rolls are appreciated, we still need to be able to tap and skip animations. *I‚Äôd also like a mode where the properties are distributed for a faster game.*The computer traded properties with the same judgment between person and computer.  *Rather than rejecting trades, offer more counter offers. Stop requesting counter offers of ridiculous amounts like $1 when making offers.
sentence: *When making mortgage and housing decisions it would be useful to be able to see the other players positions on the board.

title: Good game!
review: Overall ‚ÄòAmong Us‚Äô is a really good and addictive game. It‚Äôs super fun even when your not playing with friends. I know many people have an opinion on this (most of them good) so I just thought I spread the word even more. I feel like you should really add a friend system! That way you can send friend requests to people you would like to join‚Äôs game. Something that I find very annoying, is when your in the middle of playing, then get kicked out and it says: ‚ÄúSent 6 pings‚Äù or the ‚Äúunreliable packet source‚Äù or something. Its really annoying how you can be playing and then boom. Back to the main menu you go! So that‚Äôs something I would like if you fixed it. And finally, the trolls. I hate when people will join a game and ask ‚Äúhey any (insert gender) here?‚Äù ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs ur snap?‚Äù ‚ÄúHey how old are you?‚Äù It‚Äôs really uncomfortable. Also when people say inappropriate things like private things to other strangers. It gets me disgusted. So I thought something thst could help with that is banning. If someone is beign really rude,or innapropriate I (and many others) would appreciate it if the game can ban them for maybe 30 minutes. So they can still play, but it‚Äôs later. Like a punishment for acting however they did. But I cannot say that this game is bad. I am really enjoying the newest update very much! I just hope that you take these opinions into mind. üíô     Sincerely,                 Anaya

review: I love this game, have been playing it for quite some time.  It‚Äôs my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù favorite.  I‚Äôm somewhere around level 1100 or close to it.  Some levels are hard to the point that it gets ridiculous.  Some of the hard levels are easy or perhaps it‚Äôs just luck to win them. To continue a game (at 900 coins) for a move or two costs a fortune considering you really don‚Äôt win much.  To buy three hammers costs too much (1900 coins). title: OMG I LOVE THIS GAME- but...
review: I‚Äôve been playing Minecraft my whole life it feels like, but something is wrong with the custom skins. Say you download this skin from one of the skin apps and your so exited about it. Well to bad for you, you can‚Äôt wear it. I checked a million times to see if it‚Äôs just a update or something like that but it‚Äôs not! It‚Äôs super glitchy too, me and my cousins usually play together but it‚Äôs been lagging a lot. Then randomly it kicks you out and doesn‚Äôt let you join back in unless you reset the whole thing. You guys say that you keep fixing the game- but your not, your making it worse. We love that you are adding new things to the game and I‚Äôm not saying that‚Äôs the problem...but maybe...it is? I‚Äôm so excited for all the new things! Don‚Äôt get me wrong, everyone is! But there was a few I didn‚Äôt like personally. It was the customize your own skin thing you guys added not to long ago. We are happy that you tried to make the game better, except I really think you made it worse. That‚Äôs might just be me but I loved the game where we didn‚Äôt have all this glitchy stuff and we can play without that. And without that confusing customize your own skin thing. Please fix it! This is the game I love and will always love- but just remove some of the updates you think made the game better. Thank you!!!
sentence: I‚Äôm so excited for all the new things!

title: Great, but could use some bug squashing
review: It‚Äôs monopoly, just like you remembered in the classic board game, which is what I‚Äôve wanted on iOS for a long time. After playing very frequently, I‚Äôve been noticing some issues. 1. Dice rolls do not seem random. Quite frequently the computer rolls the perfect number to squeak by your hotels. It happens way too often. 2 when playing multiple computer opponents, if the first computer player on the list of players on the right side of the screen goes bankrupt, you can no longer purpose a deal with the other remaining opponent. It defaults to try to make a trade with the bankrupted player with no option to change it to the other player, so the only way to trade is to wait for the computer to strike a trade with you and then counter the trade. 3 when you get a card that says each player pays $10 for a birthday or whatever, the money never comes out of the players account. Maybe that‚Äôs because of the free parking rule. Not sure. 4 if you use up all of the houses so that there aren‚Äôt any more in reserve, and then sell a hotel, more houses Automatically appear. Seems odd. Being able to speed up the game instead of watching each and every animation would be appreciated.
sentence: 4 if you use up all of the houses so that there aren‚Äôt any more in reserve, and then sell a hotel, more houses Automatically appear.

title: Great game!
review: This game is so fun! Now that we have to stay home, we need bonding games that make us feel happy just being goofy! With everything being so serious and rightly so, let‚Äôs loosen up the family and laugh a little/a lot!
sentence: With everything being so serious and rightly so, let‚Äôs loosen up the family and laugh a little/a lot!

title: My experience with Among Us
review: I used to play Among Us but not really anymore and here is why:Poorly maintained. There is so much glitches present in Among Us. The last round I played the impostor was the only one remaining but the round was continuing. The black screen glitch is extremely common and sometimes the lobby glitches into the map and the game is unplayable. Second reason: The game barely updates. Ever since I started playing the game, the biggest update (not including bug fixes) was the chat assist and that is about the only new thing I can name. For a half of a year, practically nothing was added. If you cannot maintain the game properly, then you should sell it to a company that can. Third is the community. Although the developers cannot control this, it still makes the game a bad experience for many players. You may have added what I am about to say already, but if you didn‚Äôt, you should add a age restriction. There are a lot of people that play Among Us who are not very smart and accuse people for no reason and everybody listens without any evidence. This makes the game very easy for the impostor because of how gullible the majority of the community is. And even if you are the impostor it still ruins the game because you can execute it perfectly and still get voted out because ‚ÄúRed sus‚Äù I have stopped playing the game because it just never added anything new and became very bland. And the community adds on to the bad experience.
sentence: For a half of a year, practically nothing was added.

title: THERES TOO MANY BUGS RIGHT NOW
review: Now don‚Äôt get me wrong, I love the game, just today I got a score of 13M but there are so many bugs. There are 2 that really stick out. The first one starts once you get to about 100k score, but gets more prevalent once you get to about 250k. What it happens is, when you jump from the ramp up onto the train, and land on the train, you stay floating, and it won‚Äôt let you jump or roll, once you go to the left or right, it‚Äôs fixed though. That doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs fine though, because if you don‚Äôt notice it, it might kill you. The second, and worse of the two comes down to the hit-boxes. This just happened to me right before writing this review. On top of the trains, sometimes you just want to go left or right, but when you try, you stumble into nothing. That just happened to me... two trains in a row and it got me killed. Luckily I had just started the round and it seems to happen in the early stages most often so at least it‚Äôs hard to ruin your high score with that glitch, but that one is much more annoying because you can‚Äôt avoid it. There are a few others that aren‚Äôt as bad, for example, earlier I had super sneakers on and went into a jet pack, paused the game for a bit, then I started running in the air with the jet pack on. I also have screen recordings of the first glitch and this one. Please get these fixed ASAP!!!!
sentence: That just happened to me... two trains in a row and it got me killed.

title: Fun! But...
review: I've had this app on my phone for 2 years now and have had lots of fun playing it w/family & friends. I've used it while waiting in line for concerts and it definitely makes the time fly in a very enjoyable way. The only problem I'm now experiencing is the inability to make my own cards. I've enjoyed that feature a lot and have written to the developers for help, but I have yet to hear from them. I will update this review when/if this problem is taken care of.
sentence: The only problem I'm now experiencing is the inability to make my own cards.

title: Love this game BUT changes need to be made!
review: I love this game! I‚Äôve played many games, but this one has become my favorite. Over time though, I am beginning to get frustrated! You only get about 50-80 coins a game after completing the level, but in order to get more chances to play it‚Äôs 900 coins for the first 5 extra moves and then goes up to 1200. I don‚Äôt even know what‚Äôs after that, because it‚Äôs just so much! Even with the rewards they grant, you only get 100 coins which is like nothing. You really have to spend money to play this game. I‚Äôve tried to be patient and play the games out without spending money, but many levels you just can‚Äôt! I don‚Äôt mind spending the money here and there, but it‚Äôs so expensive, it doesn‚Äôt even make it worth it. You get 1000 coins for .99 and it takes 900 coins to get 5 extra turns. That adds up really quick! Plus it‚Äôs even more expensive if you want power ups! I‚Äôm not too sure how much more I can continue playing if they don‚Äôt make some changes. It‚Äôs beginning to add up with how many coins I‚Äôve been buying just to beat rounds. On top of that I believe that there are also sometimes when the board isn‚Äôt applying the power ups correctly. It's almost like a glitch or something that‚Äôs not working. I‚Äôm really hoping they make some changes to this game! Such a shame that it seems they are more concerned about money, than people continuing to play.
sentence: I‚Äôm really hoping they make some changes to this game!

title: Unfair Game Play (how is no one talking about this)
review: Design is great. I like the colors and the modern feel of moving environments makes extended play time feel flowy and not stagnant. The peices  are fine I just used to enjoy the Car actually driving and the Ship actually sailing so it‚Äôs like game is modernized in all the wrong places. Above all else the game play is so very unfair. It rolls you exactly what you don‚Äôt need EVERY TIME. I have still never won a game, it lands me on spaces that I can‚Äôt quite afford just to show me its updated mortgaging and trading system,  you can successfully predict what every player will land on by determining what would be worse for you. I know it‚Äôs supposed to make for a ‚Äúchallenging‚Äù atmosphere but it‚Äôs so heavy handed and obvious. The only fun I have with this game is literally TRYING to lose and watching how ridiculously things play out. If you have big money and storage to but. it‚Äôs worth a chuckle but if you‚Äôre looking for a fun GAME (as opposed to an hour long march of death) then pass this over.
sentence: It rolls you exactly what you don‚Äôt need EVERY TIME.

That way you can send friend requests to people you would like to join‚Äôs game. title: Used to be fun
review: I‚Äôve been playing this game for a while and am at level 1700+ Full disclosure, I‚Äôve never spent any real money on this game. Not that they‚Äôre not working extra hard to make you do it... When I started playing, it was fun because I always had a chance to win. The kite will do what it‚Äôs supposed to and the bombs won‚Äôt go and destroy the next move. The rocket with a kite won‚Äôt go and clear the row with already a rocket in it, thus ruining 2 rockets. Decorating wasn‚Äôt as hard either. You didn‚Äôt need a star to make every call and 2 stars for a rehearsal. Around level 900 it started getting frustrating and I stopped for a while. A few months ago I started playing and nothing is the same. The power ups are there to ruin your game. One has to depend on luck than tact to win. It‚Äôs now designed to eat all your hammers, kites, gloves etc but still won‚Äôt let you win. If I was frustrated before, I‚Äôm finding it hard to express myself now. Ofcourse the proportion of coins you win to the stars you earn was always unfair but atleast I knew that in every game there would be some move and a definite chance to win. They want you to buy coins, I get it, they are after all here for the money. But looks like they‚Äôre taking away the fun factor away from the game which for me has been the biggest disappointment. This was a good game, very addictive and fun. It‚Äôs getting hard to say that that is true anymore.
sentence: This was a good game, very addictive and fun.

title: The old days..
review: Yes, it‚Äôs true, I‚Äôm an OG. I‚Äôve been playing cave game, now Minecraft for as long as it‚Äôs been out. I remember how you could press g or h and you could ‚ÄúClone‚Äù yourself. The old days of classic. I remember when there was a girl in Minecraft, and the old avatars.. (Notch messed up a bit..) it‚Äôs a fun and awesome game. The days of beta were the best. I remember surprise Friday or Friday surprise, but then it stopped. Until an exception- Surprise Saturday. Ah yes. I remember why polar bears were added in the game, and the reason. Jeb‚Äôs wife (I think it‚Äôs Jeb‚Äôs..) liked polar bears, so that‚Äôs why they were added. The original Mobil lite version, and I remember when Minecraft PE was free. All this time it‚Äôs been downloaded in my cloud storage, so I never had to buy it. (Heh) This game never stops improving. But of course, I‚Äôm more of a Java version myself, of course. The days of me and the boys, staying up all night, gaming, building whatever we could. I also remember the day when Microsoft bought Mojang, or did they buy Minecraft? Anyways. The first minecon was about 30 people, mostly Notches‚Äô family. The good ol days of Minecraft. A few things could be changed though. The shooting speed of skeletons is very high, I dislike that, I have some other things, but I don‚Äôt want to keep you from doing your jobs. Thanks so much for these amazing 12 years of Minecraft! You guys rock! I can‚Äôt wait for the cave update! :)
sentence: A few things could be changed though.

title: The Best!!!!
review: I absolutely love Monopoly! I finally bought this game! (And I‚Äôm so glad they finally put it back in the App Store) My brother and myself are always playing it on the board, but after so long one or the other of us gets sick of playing it with only 2 people because all you do is hand money back and forth. So now we can play to our hearts content!! I remember there being a Monopoly in the App Store awhile ago and I absolutely loved it, but our iPad crashed and I couldn‚Äôt find another one until now. There is one thing that I loved about the old one that this new one doesn‚Äôt have and that‚Äôs is: while you are playing you could look and see how much % chance this certain lot would be landed on and by whom. For example, when I‚Äôm trying to build a house I‚Äôd look and see if the cat coming down the road would land on either Baltic Ave or Boardwalk, and the one with the greater % I‚Äôd build the house on. (I hope that makes sense) Anyway that‚Äôs about the only thing I‚Äôd change! And by the way, I LOVE that you do not have to be connected to WiFi to play!! Keep it that way!!
sentence: I absolutely love Monopoly!

title: Could this be my second love?
review: So I‚Äôve been playing Homescapes for the past couple of months (yes, I said months) and I must say this game I by far one of my favorites and I am finally at a point where can break it down real brief.Short background about me, I grew up playing the classic game Bejeweled! Which trickles down to all these copy‚Äôs of the ‚Äútraditional match-3 mechanics‚Äù, however Homescapes does a beyond amazing job of intertwining this type of game pay with a well-developed storyline! As of this review, I‚Äôm currently on level 415, have accumulated about 40 stars, and am on day 6 in the story and have only about 1/5 of the game completed (this is a rough estimate based off of the amount of the estate that I‚Äôm making progress in! This is definitely a game that I have been enjoying level by level until completion, from the basic to the super hard (difficulty settings)!There are also constant twists and turns for each level! Like the developers at Playrix really sat down and thought of a variety of ways to get people like me addicted to the amazingness their minds constructed! This is pure awesomeness! I greatly appreciate this game! It‚Äôs relaxing vibe makes it perfect for any time of enjoyment! Playrix! Y‚Äôall did your do on this one!
sentence: This is definitely a game that I have been enjoying level by level until completion, from the basic to the super hard (difficulty settings)!

title: Loveüëèüèª Itüëèüèªüëèüèª
review: I originally downloaded this app while I was at Disneyland because we played it in the long lines waiting for the rides. However it wouldn't let me unlock the Disney deck whilst we were in magic kingdom. Despite that, this app is great and I totally recommend it to anyone willing to try it.
sentence: Despite that, this app is great and I totally recommend it to anyone willing to try it.

title: Great! Also might I request a feature?
review: I love this game!!! It‚Äôs so fun! But, I would like to request a feature. Could there be an option to have more intelligent crew mates/impostors in free play? For example: I start up free play and see an option saying ‚Äúwould you like to turn on intelligent mode?‚Äù I turn it on and free play starts. It has usual free play features like picking tasks and being the impostor. But with one major difference: the AI is more intelligent. I‚Äôll give you a look at both sides of this mode. CREWMATE VIEW:You run around doing tasks with the other AI crew mates. And one of the crew mates is the impostor. The impostor‚Äôs AI does intelligent stuff like: trapping you in rooms, sabotaging electricity and such, and so much more! IMPOSTOR VIEW:The crew mates are doing tasks. While your the impostor. You take down the AI crew mates and such. But the AI crew mates does intelligent things like the AI impostor. Like:Reporting dead bodies, calling emergency meetings, and so much more! I would love to see all of this added into free play mode. I will be awaiting your response.EDIT:Ok, I think a great feature to have would be when the impostor kills you and your pet cries, you can comfort it. Like pet it and tell it everything is gonna be okay. Then it‚Äôs happy and it starts following your ghost. I would love this feature. Once again, I will be awaiting your response.‚ÄîYour biggest fan
sentence: EDIT:Ok, I think a great feature to have would be when the impostor kills you and your pet cries, you can comfort it.

title: Subway Surfers Saved My Life
review: this app is truly my only reason to live, and honestly, i dont need a better one. every single aspect of this this game is absolutely perfect. this game is so good that im writing a review whilst my phone is on 5%. ive played many games including doom (2016), Gta V, The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of the wild, Criseses 3, Crisis Warhead, Crysis, Flappy Bird and Crossy Road. and this game tops them all in every possible variation. the gramphics are so realistic that when i got caught by the police and was brutalized by him and his dog, it felt real, breathtaking even. the story, although very intricate, has a clear plot that is understandable, yet intriguing. and greatest gameplay to grace videogaming ever. i mean wow. i would like to restate the fact that i played super mario 64 and this has much better controls and gameplay. this is the peak of our human existence. this is the only reason i wake up day after day. thank you so much halfbrick games and also a thank you to glu games. you‚Äôve really done it :) ( but this is actually a pretty good game no cap)
sentence: this is the only reason i wake up day after day.

title: Do the developers read this?? I think not!!!
review: Almost all the reviews boil down to the same basic complements and complaints.  So why is nothing done to change things (example; coin and star ratios for each level)  I would pay for the game if it meant a more level playing field.  News flash folks... like everything else on the internet the developers are out to fill their coffers and nothing more.  That‚Äôs why this and every other game like it has such a low win ratio (stars & coins).  They are out for your real life dollars, and don‚Äôt give a rats tail about what you think or comments you make.  That‚Äôs how our society and economy work.  You want to progress quicker... pay up.  The only way you can change it is to not spend the money.  Money or lack there of is what gets their attention nothing else.  They will never read this or any other comment.  Or if hell freezes over and they do, they sure don‚Äôt care about what we think of their business practices and never will as long as someone out there is spending real money to advance in the game.  Bottom line... play but don‚Äôt pay otherwise no changes will ever occur.
sentence: You want to progress quicker... pay up.

title: AMAZING!
review: I‚Äôm hooked. I‚Äôve had it 2 days and I‚Äôve played over 10 games üíñ it is really awesome that they added custom things that you can change. Monopoly had always been my favorite game and I can never get people to play, but now I can play as much as I want! Only a few things I hope they change/fix. Sometimes as I‚Äôm about to win the app glitches and one piece is stuck on one space and I have no option but to quit the game I was about to win. Also I think the limited house/hotel thing is stupid. I know it‚Äôs realistic but the app should be a little more advanced and fix tedious things like that. In real life me and my brother bought an old game from the thrift store and added the houses hotels and money from the old one to the new one so we didn‚Äôt run out. There‚Äôs hardly a way to progress with the limited number. Another thing I‚Äôd like is more custom gameplay but that‚Äôs just a little thing the other two things are more pressing. But overall I love it, it makes me so happy!
sentence: But overall I love it, it makes me so happy!

title: SubwaySurfers
review: Subway Surfers is amazing!When my cousin first recommended it, I thought it was a childish game for little kids, but after I had the app downloaded onto my phone, I couldn‚Äôt stop playing it! It is very entertaining any enjoyable to collect new characters, hover boards, daily challenge items, etc. I can‚Äôt stop playing it! Although it is very neat and fun to play, there are some things that I think should be taken note of. First of all, when I‚Äôm on the main screen on the game, I‚Äôm about to click the screen to start playing, but the is always and add that pops up and I always click it. This has happened several times and it has been frustrating. Another thing is that when new characters are invited into the game, they are always super expensive. Sometimes the characters can be up to $2.99 in real money or a whole heck of a lot in game money. I never really get anything on subway surfers but one time I had saved all my money for Tasha, one of the characters. She was about 30,000 coins. Later on I looked on the app and a new character was in, and was 100,000. Although there are some bugs in the game, it is very fun and I defiantly recommend getting it.
sentence: I can‚Äôt stop playing it!

title: Do NOT buy the ‚Äúadult‚Äù add on package unless you want to be BORED!!
review: We bought the adult add on package (for $6!!!!) thinking it would add some more laughter to our game night and instantly regretted it! The worlds were not ‚Äúadult‚Äù themed and I felt my 11 year old could have heard every world. They used the word ‚Äúareola‚Äù for gods sake and found it offensive that a scientific term for a female body part was considered ‚Äúadult‚Äù or ‚Äúdirty‚Äù. Anyways this quickly ended our game night out of pure disappointment and for the serious ‚Äúbuzz kill‚Äù. Worst part I can dispute the charge to get my money back. Sigh.
sentence: thinking it would add some more laughter to our game night and instantly regretted it!

title: Love this game, but...
review: Before update:I love this game! It is so addicting! But I have suggestions, can you add a friending thing? Like where you can friend people so u to it can play with them again. Like if you know the person in real life or if you liked playing with them! I also really think you should at least have one pet for free, the mini Crewmate is like and icon for the game, but then you download it and found out you have to pay to get it. Thanks you reading this and I would recommend this game for anyone, even if these suggestions don‚Äôt happen!After Update:The update is, well, weird. The cameras on Polus have glitches all over them so when some walks on camera there is a million copies of them and on some areas, two different camera sections collide and look very weird. The chat, I like that you have the quick chat, but I really don‚Äôt like that we still can‚Äôt just type. It‚Äôs so hard to find what you want to say and by the time you find it, everyone has already voted. Also on the Polus map, the names do disappear, but I kinda like it because you can hide. Another thing on the Polus map, the lava is gone, I see the bubbles still but the actual lava is not there. One last thing, when I am a ghost, I sometimes like to go outside of the map, but I noticed that now there is no wall keeping me from going away too far, can you please bring that wall back? Thanks!
sentence: It is so addicting!

title: fun BUT...
review: so i‚Äôve actually be playing this game for a long time and rather enjoy it-it‚Äôs something to keep my mind sharp so the added bonus of being able to design your home is just a plus. this game relates heavily to like a candy crush or anything where you have to eliminate the shapes (‚Äúcandy‚Äù) to complete the level. some of them are hard but that‚Äôs the point, cool thing is you can make your own power ups if you organize your shapes in certain ways-helpful. the issues that i don‚Äôt like is that when you run out of lives (and you don‚Äôt have any coins-or your team hasn‚Äôt sent you any) it takes 25/30 minutes to get just ONE back! lame-also it‚Äôs false advertisement where in the ad to either this game or gardenscapes has you make choices to complete tasks....NOWHERE IN EITHER GAME will this ever be done! it‚Äôs always just the mode where you‚Äôre eliminating shapes. when i first downloaded the game this was very disappointing to me, now it‚Äôs whatever but still not ok if that‚Äôs what you are expecting. this is a fun game though, and has some other cool features-i suggest the download to see if you like it!
sentence: when i first downloaded the game this was very disappointing to me, now it‚Äôs whatever but still not ok if that‚Äôs what you are expecting.

title: Is anyone there?
review: This will be the third review I have wrote and still nothing posted or any response given. Why offer someone to write about your game if you have no   intention to post it? I‚Äôm sure this one will end up is the same spot as the others, the deleted/don‚Äôt care what you have to say trash. The point of every game is to be challenging, what‚Äôs the fun if it isn‚Äôt. This game however takes challenging to a whole other level! As I‚Äôve said it other post, this is not a game of skill. It‚Äôs all based if the game allows the pieces to fall, the boosters to point in the direction needed to win. A blind monkey can play this game because it‚Äôs all luck, like a slot machine. Most levels, no matter if they are regular, hard, or super hard take 2-3 lives to beat. I will say, I have on very rare occasion beat a level on the first attempt. Currently I am on level 214 ‚Äúsuper hard‚Äù I have attempted to beat this level no less than 25 times, maybe more! Challenging üôÑ?  Let‚Äôs change the game to mission impossible ü§£üò≠! I have spent real money on a package to help. It‚Äôs was useless and I went through it in a couple levels. Developers, can you tone it down a bit and let people actually get through the game like games are intended? I know that seems like a lot to ask, but at least consider it before you just delete my message. Thank you for your time and mine I wasted writing this üòÇü§£!
sentence: As I‚Äôve said it other post, this is not a game of skill.

title: Long time player.....
review: I love this game, have been playing it for quite some time.  It‚Äôs my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù favorite.  I‚Äôm somewhere around level 1100 or close to it.  Some levels are hard to the point that it gets ridiculous.  Some of the hard levels are easy or perhaps it‚Äôs just luck to win them.  I have spent days on a level and get frustrated and then dont play for a while...but i still really enjoy this game.  You CAN win every level with out a power up.  You DO NOT need to spend any money on this game, patience is a virtue (so they say).  I have spent money and lately I haven‚Äôt.  The one thing i do agree with most reviewers on is this... to buy a power up costs wayyy too much money for the amount of coins you receive for passing a level.  To continue a game (at 900 coins) for a move or two costs a fortune considering you really don‚Äôt win much.  To buy three hammers costs too much (1900 coins).  I realize they do want you to spend money and i have but even when you spend, it doesn‚Äôt give you much in return.  I mostly just wanted to let people know you don‚Äôt have to spend money to win this game...and yes, some of the tasks are eye rolling but....its still a fun game.  Even if you don‚Äôt feel like playing, you can still receive a daily reward for logging on.
sentence: I have spent days on a level and get frustrated and then dont play for a while...but i still really enjoy this game.

title: READ THIS REVIEW!!!!
review: Ok. This game is super fun! I love how you get to visit new locations (BTW I‚Äôve been to Amsterdam so it was fun to see it in the game.), get cool characters, and enjoy running in the subway.I personally think that the graphics are great. They don‚Äôt have to be perfect, as you can still play the game without problems. I have tried programming before and it IS NOT EASY. I would like to give a shoutout to whoever made this game because it is fabulous, no matter what others say.I do think that the characters are a little over priced, but that is just me. I do like how there are lots of ways to earn the money for them. (Play the game itself, watch adds, get mystery boxes, ETC.)Maybe you could add a feature where you could sign in with another account. I get that you don‚Äôt need an account to play (And that is great!) but my favorite character, Tagbot, is on my other device. I remember him being very expensive and I would love a way to sign into that account on another device so I could get Tagbot back.Thank you for reading this review. I can tell that this game was planned out and worked hard on. Great job!!!
sentence: I have tried programming before and it IS NOT EASY.

title: Glad to see it return
review: I still have an old version of the game, no longer a available but I still play it. This is like an upgraded version. I‚Äôve never tried to play on line but I will. I like being able to play against the computer at different player levels, the old one had that too. I love that I can still customize but I feel like there are fewer options to customize. I don‚Äôt like all of the options but being able to play shortened games is an absolute plus. I wish I could still choose the money we start with The looks sharp and the tokens move quickly. I don‚Äôt like the ALL PROPERTY IS UP FOR AUCTION, even if I land on it everyone gets a shot at trying to out bid me. That should only occur if do not wish to. By the property. Overall I like it, I will play it, I will learn the other elements of the game and I will recommend it. Monopoly has helped through long lines, airport delays and sleepless nights. Thank you
sentence: Monopoly has helped through long lines, airport delays and sleepless nights.

title: Game freezes, and then you get the same words.
review: This was our go-to game every time my dad was in the hospital or back home recuperating. It was great, until relatively recently.Now the game freezes at the ‚ÄòTime‚Äôs Up‚Äô screen after playing a single round, forcing you to close out the app.Upon restarting the app, you are then given the same words you had in the previous round when selecting the same category, thereby limiting you to play each category only once. I‚Äôve bought several packs, but it is now basically a waste of money and memory space on my phone.I‚Äôve reached out to support, but after reading the many articles on this problem I found online, I‚Äôm doubtful they will respond. If they do reach out, and fix the app, I will update my review.Until then, I recommend avoiding purchasing this game as well as any additional decks/packs.
sentence: I‚Äôve bought several packs, but it is now basically a waste of money and memory space on my phone.

title: Good game, but
review: Minecraft is actually a game I play on a daily basis with my friends. It‚Äôs fun, entertaining, and creative. But the LAG. Recently, a few days ago, when playing with my friend in a world, it kept kicking me out of the app, disconnecting me, yet I have full bars of internet. One time, when I was sleeping, it kicked me out. When I went back into the world, it kept me in the sleeping mode. However, whenever I put leave bed, it would kick me out of the app. Some side effects were my avatar got glitchy and laggy. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs my device or not, but I cannot talk about it. Secondly, I would like if we can build all the materials except the blocks, (nether blocks, etc.). I hate that every time I see a horse, I have to change cheats on and change to creative to get a saddle.I would also like if we could make realistic things like tables, plates to put in our food in, chairs, etc. Although minor, it would still be a great update if it was actual c: Edit: I just dropped it down to 1 star, maybe even deserves zero for how much I disconnect and lag. It‚Äôs frustrating having to get kicked out, join back in, and it not being saved. I get kicked out every 5-10 min. Each time I turn off my wifi. It‚Äôs really annoying and I recommend to find out what‚Äôs going on, because my internet is 3 bars and my device is new.
sentence: However, whenever I put leave bed, it would kick me out of the app.

title: Super disappointed
review: I bought the game for .99 in hopes to entertain the family during the quarantine. Much to my disappointment, the standard games that come with the app aren‚Äôt good and too hard for my 8 year old to play. I had no idea I had to purchase the ‚Äúgood‚Äù games that my children want to play. The Greatest Hits and Family Fun packs are 50% off but still cost $9-10! We will not be buying or playing :(
sentence: We will not be buying or playing :(

title: This is difficult...
review: First of all I would like to say I like this game , it‚Äôs fun and entertaining. But the thing that is bothering me is that it‚Äôs so expensive to get characters! Like there is a time limit to get the characters and before I get a chance to buy it the time is done because of how long it takes to get enough coins. Um not saying they need to be SUPER CHEAP but at least cheaper than you make them ( I would recommend like 10-30k MAX) it‚Äôs ridiculous to spend 90k on a character! Also, it take a really long amount of time to get KEYS !!! Like there should be way more ways to get keys. I have been playing this game for over 3 months and got like 80 keys max. I feel that I should of had between like 1,000 at least. Overall it is a entertaining and fun game. I would recommend but just be aware for anyone who plays it it‚Äôs hard to get the things you want. I don‚Äôt like complaining but I just wanted to let you know.
sentence: I feel that I should of had between like 1,000 at least.

title: Riding the fence
review: I love the whole concept of the game, the feeling of accomplishment and pride, lol, as if it were MY home. The ONLY reason I put 3 stars is because the spend v reward is the biggest joke I have ever seen on any game I have played. Period. There isn‚Äôt a level you cannot beat with no money involved but it will take you about 4 days of playing the same level. Then you spend astronomical amounts of money to buy the goodies that help you win each level to have them nickel and dime you by making sure at the very last, when you should be able to pick a move that has ALWAYS, with no exception, removed x amount of things in certain patterns or directions, it only works partially. So, guess what? You guessed it! When you have already spent gratuitous amounts of money to win something, that never in a million years makes you feel like you won anything, you have to spend more. My moral to this story is, as much as I like the whole concept of the game, I get so angry and frustrated at their trickery(aka:dishonesty) with their power plays and how they usually work compared to what happens at the end and how the reward system works that I have decided to find a game that I have no problem spending money on but walk away feeling happy and relaxed about how I spent my very little free time that I have and my money that I work very hard d for.
sentence: I love the whole concept of the game, the feeling of accomplishment and pride, lol, as if it were MY home.

title: Greedy Developers
review: The developers of these kinds of games don‚Äôt care about giving us quality games, they just want to say they are making the games ‚Äúchallenging and fun‚Äù but are really just wanting us to dole out tons of real money to line their greedy pockets... Challenging and fun does not mean rob me blind just to get through some levels on a stupid game that looked awesome but was deceiving... I am having to use all my energy 3-5 times refilled just to get through one level!!! That is 15-25 energy for ONE FREAKING LEVEL!!! Some of these levels are near impossible and the developers don‚Äôt care to listen to our complaints since there are so many of us who give in to buying our way through the game we cannot otherwise get through... I have already uninstalled this pathetic excuse for a game... If I could develope a game similar to this and Matchington Manor/Gardenscapes, even poor as I am I know I wouldn‚Äôt be trying to rip people off... These games could be good and I would be willing to pay for packages but not just to get through levels... The ratio of money we earn in comparison to what things cost is just ridiculous... But like I said the developers of these games do not care about anything but lining heir filthy greedy pockets and I for one will not aid in doing so when I can play actual gun games that don‚Äôt require real money just to progress... Buying packages should be when you want to buy limited time house items or something...
sentence: These games could be good and I would be willing to pay for packages but not just to get through levels...

title: Great but....
review: Ok there is just a few things to adjust for one I‚Äôm a kid so I can only pretty much play the animal one ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è and I‚Äôm not buying the kid one because that one is just meh. So maybe add another version and also i would like to be able to set the amount of time and adjust some things but overall if you don‚Äôt have anything to do and you want to kill time with friends then buy this. It still is great even without my recommendations  because I play this when waiting for lines in six flags and it is just perfect.
sentence: It still is great even without my recommendations  because I play this when waiting for lines in six flags and it is just perfect.

title: I miss the good game
review: Alright look this game used to be my favorite for me and my friends to have fun and really helped me not be bored in quarantine. The game rarely glitched and overall was the best mobile game I‚Äôd found in a while. But after this last update I can‚Äôt say that anymore. I love the idea of not showing who voted who ( it really helps with the occasional bullies) and I like the point of the update. Next I will say what I would like you to add adding friends, maybe more maps ( I like the ones you have but a big Change like that sound good), no hacking ( it‚Äôs still happening just not the full game bug you guys had), and actual bug fixes. Let me explain the last one or why I can‚Äôt say I love the game anymore. Earlier today I was playing with my younger sister and teaching her to play, sounds fun right? Well it was but soon after we had to make a new game bc people weren‚Äôt able to stay on our game with being kicked off for no reason. So me and her tried making a new game and it basically told us we had been M.I.A when the game hadn‚Äôt even loaded yet. Then we gave up. Later that day i by myself tried playing a game and it kept telling me I have an old version of the game even tho it just updated a day before. So that brings us to now. Pease actually do bug fixes and please read this and take note of how your game is extremely glitchy and isn‚Äôt a fun game anymore. Thank you very much for reading.
sentence: But after this last update I can‚Äôt say that anymore.

title: Love the look and story but may quit
review: I came to this inside one to recapture the excitement and pleasure I got at the beginning of my Gardenscapes play. I loved watching the garden change and feeling I had a say in just how it looked. I even paid attention to Austin‚Äôs in-game FB posts and enjoyed when he had visitors. Then...it got harder and harder to pass levels. I have little money to spend so I rarely buy ‚Äúhelps‚Äù but I do write reviews when I love a game and tell friends to check it out. I haven‚Äôt played Gardenscapes for weeks now‚Äîthough I sometimes open it up to look at how pretty the garden is and to tell Austin I‚Äôm still on vacation and to take care of the house. With the Homescapes game I am enjoying a feeling of accomplishment again but I assume that too will soon end. I think the developers have made it way too hard to make any progress that the discouragement way outweighs any fun. Why not give us a way to earn more points (rather than watching commercials about other games‚Äîand even that doesn‚Äôt get you much)? I almost deleted Gardenscapes last week I was so frustrated. Then decided to try carpet and furniture rather than fountains and flowers. We shall see....
sentence: I loved watching the garden change and feeling I had a say in just how it looked.

title: Pretty good game, but a massive problem + suggestions
review: I play this game pretty much every DAY, it‚Äôs fun! But a big problem for me is playing the actual game. Most of the time when I try to join a server with 6/10(More or less) players, it says the game has either already started or the lobby is full. I refresh the servers, and there‚Äôs barely any. I try another one, same problem. I‚Äôm usually spending at least 2-3 minutes just trying to join a game with settings I like. Another thing that happens a lot is that when I refresh the servers, there‚Äôs none available! I‚Äôm not sure if this is a me problem, but PLEASE fix this!! It‚Äôs been a month or so since you said updates and Airship(The new map) were coming to Among Us, where are they!? There‚Äôs probably a bunch of people getting impatient, you really gotta hurry up.Suggestions: A friending system, I‚Äôve met so many nice people when playing! It would be nice for a friending system! Another suggestion is more customization, there‚Äôs only 12 colors along with a not so massive selection of hats. I‚Äôm not allowed to buy anything online, so it would be cool for more customization for people that can‚Äôt afford to buy more hats and things! My final suggestion is MORE GAMEMODES!!! It gets confusing when I‚Äôm playing Hide and Seek and then more people join and they don‚Äôt know the rules. Overall, it‚Äôs a good game, but needs some adding. Sorry for the super long review I just had a lot to say
sentence: My final suggestion is MORE GAMEMODES!!!

title: I've played 10 years
review: I started playing Minecraft the day it came out. I have it on all platforms. For a company to purchase this game for 2.5 billion dollars and it still be this buggy and have this little content amazes me. I have a realm and pay $8 a month but it‚Äôs barely playable. Mobile edition crashes all the time, everything is super laggy when more players join the game. Don‚Äôt get me started on the bugs it makes the game worthless. As an owner I can barely access the settings with it bugging out. They have NO customer service only a fake skeleton crew that will never reply to you. I sent an emergency customer service request only to get a reply ONE YEAR LATER. This is one of the greatest ongoing scams of this century. They feed off of children buying skins and maps while doing nothing to progress the game. They will milk it until it‚Äôs dry and then cast it aside like a vampire with a used carcass. It‚Äôs not the employees fault as I have made friends with them over the years and they are hardworking people who don‚Äôt have the resources and support they need. It‚Äôs Microsoft‚Äôs fault because they just want the money and not the investment. They have left this game with just a few people managing it and it‚Äôs a disgrace to the name of business. I‚Äôm a longtime player who loves this game more than anyone but I‚Äôm not afraid to point out this ongoing scam.
sentence: As an owner I can barely access the settings with it bugging out.

title: Oh god
review: OK listen I loved the game so much. Till they added quick chat. Quick chat just makes the game even more confusing it limits what you get to say. I know the editors of this game probably thought it was a smart idea because people were being mean and saying swearwords to each other but it‚Äôs a really bad idea because, it is more confusing than when I first got this game. I would love it if they removed the quick chat. And plus people are entering the game with their name as ‚Äúme‚Äù or ‚Äúi‚Äù to beat the System. So you see the system of quick chat is pretty flawed, specially if there‚Äôs a new player in the game that doesn‚Äôt even know how to chat. When this update first came in I was excited until I found out all the things that I would have to learn it was more confusing than a second grader taking a 12th grade math test. So please remove this feature and go back to the original state. Plus if people were being mean with swearwords people have the option if they didn‚Äôt want to see swearwords or if they wanted to. How about you add an account feature where you can make an account to have friends maybe a while-playing chat feature. Please take some of these ideas into consideration because the game is so big. Thank you and have a good day.
sentence: So please remove this feature and go back to the original state.

title: Awful Update
review: All of my worlds have been corrupted since the latest update went live. My game crashes every few minutes, and upon loading the world again it deletes things. There was no need to change the villages' appearances, as they were what made Minecraft, well.. Minecraft. The game doesn't feel the same after the update, and to any new players, I would no longer recommend it. I've played this game for 7 years now, and I've never been this disappointed. A friend of mine can no longer even load the game to play our world together. It's upsetting. It's truly upsetting. The game lags and my world's so corrupted entire chunks glitch out. I don't like it anymore. And no company should ever send out an update that they know has problems they have to acknowledge in the update notice. That's just uncalled for. I'm really upset with the direction the game's going and a lot of people are claiming to be having these problems. I don't want my world to be messed up forever. I don't want to lose this game, but I can not only bear to stand to play it, I literally can't keep it open with this update. Get it together. I miss Minecraft being Minecraft and this update's ruined everything. I don't want anyone else to be as disappointed as I am. With the amount of kids that play this game, they don't deserve it. Their parents don't need to be stressing over why everything's wrong with their kid's game. Nobody wants this.
sentence: Nobody wants this.

title: Waste of time
review: Great game!! However, I bought this app so that I could play with my long distant friends, but we could never finish ANY game. The game has way too many bugs. It crashes and stop the game every time someone disconnect, which affects you and everyone else playing the same match. Getting disconnected is way too common, it happens when you get notification, when you click off the game for a split second, when you get a call, when you get a low battery warning, or poor wifi connection. The game can stop and crash at any point in the game. I wasted 2 hours playing a round just so it could crash mostly every single time. Out of the 35 games I‚Äôve played, I only got through 7 of them. Mind you, I had to pay for this app. It‚Äôs ridiculous. DONT BUY THIS APP unless they start making changes and improvements to it. Also they do not have any type of communication system so you can‚Äôt talk to your opponents. That should be included in the game to communicate with your opponents, negotiate for trades, or just to simply remind your opponents to end the game. There are many more flaws that takes away the authentic feeling of playing the boardgame Monopoly. Once again, don‚Äôt waste your money and time on this app until they start making further improvements and changes to it.
sentence: DONT BUY THIS APP unless they start making changes and improvements to it.

title: Awesome game, a few suggestions
review: Words can‚Äôt describe how much I love this game!! It‚Äôs just so fun and addicting. I just got it about three weeks ago and I haven‚Äôt stopped playing since. Although it‚Äôs a very well made very fun to play game, there‚Äôs some things that I think would be cool to add either to among us or among us 2. 1. There should be a way to kick people faster if you‚Äôre the host during a game. Some people like to call emergency meetings and waste time, so being able to kick them out would make it go by way faster. 2. I think it would be awesome to add a send a friend request button. Some people have really good friendships on here and a lot of the time one of them might disconnect or have to go and never see each other again! ;( If we had a add friend button, we could always play with them. Plus, when you try to give your personal number or social media‚Äôs out to someone, the whole server can see it unless you ban them all. 3. I think I saw this on another review, but maybe add a limit to camera time? It‚Äôs kinda hard to kill when people are guarding the cameras. 4. Hackers and exploiters should be automatically banned from playing. Maybe you could install a thing that detects their programming and stuff? They ruin the game a lot. Other than that, this game is amazing! Definitely game of the year. It‚Äôs made 2020 so much better. 5 stars for sure
sentence: There should be a way to kick people faster if you‚Äôre the host during a game.

title: More than just 4 players
review: Honestly I love the game. The themed boards are so beautiful. The attention to detail for the pieces are perfect. The animation throughout the game is outstanding. I play it all the time at work and at home. I‚Äôve put my coworkers and a bunch of friends on the app as well so I can have friends to play it with, but since it only allows 4 players some of them get left out. I feel like there should be an option to allow more than just 4 players. Like when you setting the game up, there‚Äôs a section asking how many players and it give the option of about 4-6 players especially when your playing with friends. Now just regular online can stay the same because too many players can cause the game to drag out but if playing with friends then 4-6 players at least. That would be greatly appreciated.
sentence: The attention to detail for the pieces are perfect.

title: Great but some suggestions
review: It‚Äôs an amazing app and I LOVE it but there are a few problems. 1. It keeps kicking me out before I even get a chance to play a game. For instance, I was playing with a bunch of my friends on a call, and right when the game started, it kicked me out and I didn‚Äôt get to play. But luckily, I have it on my computer and I still got to play, but not for a couple of rounds. Maybe it‚Äôs just my phone, but maybe not. 2. We need friends in the game. Let me explain. If you play like 5 games in a row with someone and you‚Äôre bonding with them, maybe you have to go or maybe they have to go, or if you get kicked or something, you never get to see each other ever again. Also it could be the same thing except with friends. And maybe you can see if you‚Äôre friends (in the game) are playing. 3. Newer stuff, like new colors, tasks and hats would be absolutely amazing! I have seen that the developers are working on a new map. 1 question about that. Is it gonna be a hide and seek map? If so that would be the most wonderful thing! Or even just another map even if the one you‚Äôre working on isn‚Äôt a hide and seek one. I love Among Us and all its features. I very much respect everyone that works on it, and I know it‚Äôs hard. But acknowledging at least 1 of the things I listed would be, I can‚Äôt even explain. Thank you so much for reading.
sentence: It keeps kicking me out before I even get a chance to play a game.

title: GAME FOR GODS OF MYSTERY (or a big fat toxic community)

title: A Major Problem
review: I discovered Among Us playing with friends on private mode. If you decide to just stick with private mode then you will be absolutely fine. You can have a fun time with some friends and overall enjoy this game. But then I tried public games.It wasn‚Äôt as bad as you think it would be. I ran into a total of one weirdo and was totally fine. I had no problems. The only time something really weird happened was when somebody with a weird name had tried to get us to follow his/her Twitter, but thanks to the new update Among Us blocks your ability to redirect to another website in the chat. Here‚Äôs the thing though. Recently, I ran into another one of the weird-named people, and they said in the chat that the lobby was hacked and he/she had all of the players‚Äô IP addresses. This was an empty threat, as IP addresses are public knowledge (and you can‚Äôt find out where you are based on them)and Apple phones are virtually impossible to hack. However, this really shook me up and I deleted Among Us immediately. I didn‚Äôt want to be hacked. EVER. It was kind of scary even though I knew the extensive anti-hacking measures taken place by InnerSloth (the game‚Äôs creator). While this game is fun, it‚Äôs not worth it being scared every time my friends aren‚Äôt up for a game. If you are getting this for a group of friends/family, then you are fine. But stick with private games, and if InnerSloth can, fix these hackers!!!!
sentence: I ran into a total of one weirdo and was totally fine.

title: Love the game, but hardly works
review: I absolutely love the gameplay and concept of this game. As far as games go this is the most addicting mobile game I‚Äôve personally played. I‚Äôve enjoyed it  since this game came to iOS and have even purchased some in-game cosmetic gear. I just wanna say I appreciate the devs don‚Äôt give any pay to win options in the game. Some of the tasks are annoying and the maps need balancing I think. Other than that I think the gameplay is the strongest aspect of this game as it preys on our natural suspicions of others and that‚Äôs an amazing concept for strangers and friends to play. The biggest problem I‚Äôve had though, and the reason for the 3 star rating is due to the fact that I can hardly even get matches when I want to. I get error messages often saying I was dropped from the server or that the matchmaker is full. As someone who has put money into this game I find this unacceptable. I understand the rare server issue here and there but when it takes over 20 minutes to search for game I feel like I‚Äôm literally wasting time. This game was the number one ranked action game at one point and there are ads at the end of every match. Surely the devs need to work out a better deal with their current sponsors. I really hope they don‚Äôt just divert all their assets into the planned sequel because I don‚Äôt believe the sequel will be as much of a success as it could be if any players are left disappointed in this game.
sentence: I just wanna say I appreciate the devs don‚Äôt give any pay to win options in the game.

title: Enjoyable but has some shortcomings
review: I‚Äôve been playing this game for a while and it‚Äôs enjoyable, occasionally challenging, and a good way to kill some time. However, I would really like to see some better incentives to keep players in the game. For some of the side challenges (e.g. knitting), the rewards, such as unlimited lives for a certain period of time, are given immediately. If I had the option to save that reward for a rainy day, perhaps when I‚Äôm tackling a particularly difficult level, I‚Äôd be more inclined to play for longer periods of time. When this happens, however, it‚Äôs almost always the case that I don‚Äôt have the time to actually use said reward and it ends up being useless. I‚Äôd also like to see the coin rewards have a better balance. 50-70 coins as a reward for each level won? Come on! What about an additional ten or so coins for each remaining turn? Say if I‚Äôve beaten a level and I have five turns left. I should win the base coins of fifty and then an additional fifty for each turn I didn‚Äôt use. For harder levels, base coins of 100 and then an additional fifty coins for each additional remaining turn. Now THAT‚ÄôS an incentive! That would be rad. Otherwise, fun game!
sentence: For harder levels, base coins of 100 and then an additional fifty coins for each additional remaining turn.

title: Among us is dead
review: Ok, so among used to be the worlds most popular game. I personally was over the top crazy for it and loved it, but it‚Äôs now dead for many reasons. One reason is hackers and cheaters. More mods are being used and hacking and cheating is getting more popular. Some times, I can‚Äôt play one game without a hacker or cheater. Multiple people play together and say who is the imposter and some hackers are being able to kill in the middle of meetings and do visuals as imposter. Another reason is that there are no new maps. Among us said that the new airship would come out in early December 2020, but they delayed it and said early 2021. Everyone thought it would come out in January or February, but it‚Äôs March and it still hasn‚Äôt come out yet. Another reason is that the new chat update can‚Äôt let you talk freely. Now you spend all of  your meeting time searching around for the prewritten text that you want to say. Another reason is the horrible connection. Some times, I have to spend like 20 minutes trying to connect my game. People say it‚Äôs my bad wifi, but that‚Äôs not true because my wifi works perfectly fine. The last reason is that some people change settings so that either the crew or the imposters have an almost certain win. If you are reading this long review, then I thank you for your time. If you are reading this and are from inner sloth, then hopefully you will consider doing something to revive among us.
sentence: The last reason is that some people change settings so that either the crew or the imposters have an almost certain win.

title: Fun with a few minor issues
review: Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I love this game, but it seems a little slow. Like in the beginning when I was trying to repair the entry hall, the can of paint spilled. I know that it only took 1 star to clean it up, but really? That part was a waste of coding and time for one little thing that they don‚Äôt need, and it was annoying. I just started playing, and I already like it, but I also see that it will be a little stubborn and slow at certain times. And in Austin‚Äôs room, when your done with it and everything looks new, there‚Äôs a dusty old desk that doesn‚Äôt go with the room, and I felt  like I should replace it, but I can‚Äôt. There were a few more parts that didn‚Äôt need to be there, but they put them there. Like when Austin‚Äôs dad stomps on the floor and breaks it, he they didn‚Äôt have to do that. Austin would have repaired it anyway. I am also confused about when Austin got to the house and went into his room and instead of a bed, there was a couch. Where did he sleep? Also, if nobody had lived in the house for years, why where the clothes on the statues not dusty? If you make another game from another game then shouldn‚Äôt you mention it? I mean it said nothing about Gardenscapes. I liked the game, but it had a few issues.
sentence: If you make another game from another game then shouldn‚Äôt you mention it?

And when i go into one the minigames, that minigame being High-School Roleplay there are problems with my custom skin. So idk if this has to do with the server but this has happened most of the time. Even when i do the inventory menu my custom skin is still there. So Mojang, if you see this then please reach out to me. My Minecraft account is a Xbox live account named Endermen21YT. I‚Äôve even noticed that this has happened to other ppl before on those servers. And it only happens when I enter the minigame. In the main server my skin‚Äôs fine. So anyway yeah that‚Äôs all. title: Good start but a few suggestions
review: Overall the game is enjoyable, but a couple of annoying issues: the 3D city looks good but it‚Äôs not in 3D very often and when it is it‚Äôs usually obstructed by a game card, property purchase and so on. Would be nice to see the city in 3D more often during gameplay. The ‚Äúyour turn‚Äù banner obstructs the dice momentarily. The dice should never be obstructed. When adding houses to the purple properties, the add houses button extends over the purple properties making it difficult to add properties there. I find myself accidentally not buying a property because the buy or not buy buttons are too close together. Maybe a different layout for buying properties. For games against the computer it would be nice to limit the number of times the computer offers a trade. It gets to the point where it is offering trades on every dice roll which slows the game down. For the custom rule set, having an option to start the game with more money would be nice. The EA version of this game had a terrific animation for the game pieces. Would be nice to see the something similar here.
sentence: The ‚Äúyour turn‚Äù banner obstructs the dice momentarily.

title: I love this game
review: Idk if it‚Äôs only me but I love this games soundtrack the music is so beautiful. I never really thought of myself as a fan of Jazz but the music is just so freaking good. I love that it‚Äôs a game within a game and you get to play and the boards and also complete tasks to decorate. I think the characters are absolutely adorable. I just love the game in general especially the soundtrack! Did I mention the soundtrack ? Still I didn‚Äôt give it 5 stars because 900 coins to continue a level you‚Äôve almost beat is just ridiculous and the count go really really fast. I won‚Äôt lie I have spent at least $30 in total on buying coins they‚Äôve had me hooked. That was far enough though and I figure I spend a lot of money on dumb things why not on something I enjoy doing and that also relaxes me ? Still they won‚Äôt get anymore out of me than that. I usually just wait until they are giving a lot of hrs of lives and play as many boards as I can until I beat them. I don‚Äôt sleep much at night so I play either then or in my free time. Still I think the game is absolutely adorable and well thought out. The visuals are lovely as well. Job well done.

title: Starting to not like the game
review: I use to love subway surfers it was my favorite game to play but it‚Äôs becoming very annoying with all its issues! I use to have so many characters but this is the third time the game has reset itself and only kept my score and deleted all my money my keys and my characters that I‚Äôve earned. If this continues to happen I will no longer play this game. I‚Äôm so infuriated right now! I had over 180 keys and over 20,000 coins and it‚Äôs all gone back to the original 18 or so keys and 5000 or so coins they give you at the start of your progress. Also I beat all the missions so that I‚Äôd have 30x multiplayer and it‚Äôs back down as well. Again this is the third time this has happened to me and I‚Äôm getting tired of playing to earn all this stuff just for the game to glitch and take it all away. Not once have I taken the game off my phone either. I‚Äôll just go in like normal and everything has been reset except for my score once I sign into Facebook. I honestly don‚Äôt even think I‚Äôll keep the game anymore. I‚Äôve contacted support through email and all they did was ask questions and never helped or returned anything I‚Äôve earned and now it‚Äôs happened again.
sentence: Also I beat all the missions so that I‚Äôd have 30x multiplayer and it‚Äôs back down as well.

title: Unable to Properly Migrate Data
review: I loved this game! I‚Äôd been playing it for years, and just recently deleted it. I really wasn‚Äôt planning on getting it back, but I just felt like playing it again. Then I try to get my old save back. Hours upon hours of grind for skins, hoverboards, and more all lost because my data can‚Äôt be transferred from the cloud. I have no idea why this happened, or why I can‚Äôt get it back, but I hope I‚Äôll be helping somebody else by telling them that once you delete the game, you most likely won‚Äôt get anything you‚Äôve collected back. I tried refreshing, I tried resetting my phone, I tried to get help from others. But somehow it‚Äôs like my data never existed! It‚Äôs like I‚Äôve never played the game! Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I enjoyed this game as muck as anyone else, but it loses its fun when you‚Äôre back to square one after you've been playing at such a high level for so long. I hope that this won‚Äôt be the end of the game for me, and I hope this won‚Äôt be the end of my data either.
sentence: I loved this game!

title: THERES TOO MANY BUGS RIGHT NOW
review: Now don‚Äôt get me wrong, I love the game, just today I got a score of 13M but there are so many bugs. There are 2 that really stick out. The first one starts once you get to about 100k score, but gets more prevalent once you get to about 250k. What it happens is, when you jump from the ramp up onto the train, and land on the train, you stay floating, and it won‚Äôt let you jump or roll, once you go to the left or right, it‚Äôs fixed though. That doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs fine though, because if you don‚Äôt notice it, it might kill you. The second, and worse of the two comes down to the hit-boxes. This just happened to me right before writing this review. On top of the trains, sometimes you just want to go left or right, but when you try, you stumble into nothing. That just happened to me... two trains in a row and it got me killed. Luckily I had just started the round and it seems to happen in the early stages most often so at least it‚Äôs hard to ruin your high score with that glitch, but that one is much more annoying because you can‚Äôt avoid it. There are a few others that aren‚Äôt as bad, for example, earlier I had super sneakers on and went into a jet pack, paused the game for a bit, then I started running in the air with the jet pack on. I also have screen recordings of the first glitch and this one. Please get these fixed ASAP!!!!
sentence: The first one starts once you get to about 100k score, but gets more prevalent once you get to about 250k.

title: AMAZING!
review: I‚Äôm hooked. I‚Äôve had it 2 days and I‚Äôve played over 10 games üíñ it is really awesome that they added custom things that you can change. Monopoly had always been my favorite game and I can never get people to play, but now I can play as much as I want! Only a few things I hope they change/fix. Sometimes as I‚Äôm about to win the app glitches and one piece is stuck on one space and I have no option but to quit the game I was about to win. Also I think the limited house/hotel thing is stupid. I know it‚Äôs realistic but the app should be a little more advanced and fix tedious things like that. In real life me and my brother bought an old game from the thrift store and added the houses hotels and money from the old one to the new one so we didn‚Äôt run out. There‚Äôs hardly a way to progress with the limited number. Another thing I‚Äôd like is more custom gameplay but that‚Äôs just a little thing the other two things are more pressing. But overall I love it, it makes me so happy!

title: CRASHES: SUPPORT WILL NOT RESPOND
review: I've read this from other reviewers as well. After purchasing multiple packs the app will now no longer launch. Instead, it crashes immediately. I've reached out several times to support about the issue but they refuse to respond to my support ticket. It's too bad because I loved playing this game with my children.
